foreignData.name: Dunkler Sog
foreignData.text: Für jedes {B} das Du zusätzlich zu den Beschwörungskosten ausgibst, fügt der Dunkle Sog seinem Ziel -das kann sowohl Spieler als auch Kreatur seineinen Schadenspunkt zu. Sodann bekommst Du für jeden so angerichteten Schadenspunkt 1 Lebenspunkt dazu. Du kannst allerdings nicht mehr Lebenspunkte gewinnen als die Kreatur Widerstandskraft bzw. der Spieler Lebenspunkte besitzt.

mainBoard.name: Drain Life
mainBoard.originalText: Drain Life does 1 damage to a single target for each {B} spent in addition to the casting cost. Caster gains 1 life for each damage inflicted. If you drain life from a creature, you cannot gain more life than the creature's current toughness.

rulings.text: Cost reducers can be used to reduce the X part of the mana cost.
You may gain up to the total toughness of the creature even if it was already damaged.

mainBoard.text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Drain Life deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

mainBoard.name: El-Hajjâj
mainBoard.originalText: You gain 1 life for every point of damage El-Hajjâj inflicts.
mainBoard.text: Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

foreignData.name: Furcht
foreignData.text: Die verzauberte Kreatur kann nur durch schwarze Kreaturen und Artefaktkreaturen geblockt werden.

mainBoard.name: Fear
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature cannot be blocked by any creatures except black creatures and artifact creatures.
mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

mainBoard.flavorText: "There are some qualities—some incorporate things,/ That have a double life, which thus is made/ A type of twin entity which springs/ From matter and light, evinced in solid and shade." —Edgar Allan Poe, "Silence"
mainBoard.name: Frozen Shade
mainBoard.text: {B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

foreignData.name: Heulen aus dem Jenseits
foreignData.text: Die Zielkreatur erhält +X/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

mainBoard.name: Howl from Beyond
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature gains +X/+0 until end of turn.
mainBoard.text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: "...There was no trace/ Of aught on that illumined face..." —Samuel Coleridge, "Phantom"

foreignData.name: Hypnotisierendes Gespenst
foreignData.text:
Kann fliegen.
Fügt das Gespenst einem Spieler Schaden zu, so muß dieser eine zufällig gewählte Karte aus seiner Hand abwerfen. Hat derjenige Spieler keine Karten auf der Hand, ignoriere diesen Effekt.

mainBoard.name: Hypnotic Specter
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
An opponent damaged by Specter must discard a card at random from his or her hand. Ignore this effect if opponent has no cards left in hand.

rulings.text: The ability triggers even if the Specter’s damage is being redirected to an opponent. It does not trigger if damage that would have been dealt to the opponent is redirected to a nonopponent player or a creature, or if the damage is prevented.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random.

mainBoard.flavorText: When Raganorn unsealed the catacombs, he found more than the dead and their treasures.
mainBoard.name: Murk Dwellers
mainBoard.originalText: When attacking, Murk Dwellers gain +2/+0 if not blocked.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when something “attacks and isn’t blocked” triggers in the declare blockers step after blockers are declared if (1) that creature is attacking and (2) no creatures are declared to block it. It will trigger even if that creature was put onto the battlefield attacking rather than having been declared as an attacker in the declare attackers step.

mainBoard.text: Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of combat.

mainBoard.flavorText: Sometimes the smallest nuisance can be the greatest pain.
mainBoard.name: Pit Scorpion
mainBoard.originalText: If Scorpion damages opponent, opponent gets a poison counter. If opponent ever has ten or more poison counters, opponent loses game.
mainBoard.text: Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

mainBoard.name: Tawnos's Wand
mainBoard.originalText: {2}: Make a creature of power no greater than 2 unblockable by all creatures except artifact creatures until end of turn. Other cards may be used to increase target creature's power beyond 2 after defense is chosen.
mainBoard.text: {2}, {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

foreignData.name: Terror
foreignData.text: Bringe eine Kreatur direkt auf den Friedhof. Dieser Zauber hat keine Wirkung auf schwarze und Artefaktkreaturen.

mainBoard.name: Terror
mainBoard.originalText: Buries target creature. Cannot target black creatures or artifact creatures.
mainBoard.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

foreignData.text: 3, {T}: Verhindere bis zu 2 Schadenspunkte gegen Dich.

sideBoard.name: Conservator

sideBoard.text: {3}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

foreignData.name: Todesgriff
foreignData.text: {B}{B}: Neutralisiere einen grünen Spruch. Spiele diese Eigenschaft wie einen Unterbrechungszauber.

sideBoard.name: Deathgrip
sideBoard.originalText: {B}{B} Counter a green spell as it is being cast. This ability is played as an interrupt and does not affect green cards already in play.

foreignData.name: Düsternis
foreignData.text: Das Sprechen weißer Zaubersprüche verteuert sich um 3 Mana. Weiße Verzauberungen mit Aktivierungskosten werden ebenfalls um 3 Mana teurer.

sideBoard.name: Gloom
sideBoard.originalText: White spells cost 3 more mana to cast. White enchantments with activation costs require 3 more mana to use.

rulings.text: The additional mana is paid at the same time the spell/ability is cast/activated.
The extra mana is not considered part of the activation cost. It is a separate cost.
The extra mana is part of the total cost, so cost reducers can be applied to this cost.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They're generally written "[Cost]: [Effect]." Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text.

sideBoard.text:
White spells cost {3} more to cast.
Activated abilities of white enchantments cost {3} more to activate.

foreignData.name: Knochenthron
foreignData.text: {1}: Jeder erfolgreich gesprochene schwarze Zauberspruch gibt Dir 1 Lebenspunkt. Du kannst diese Eigenschaft sofort oder später während des Zuges anwenden, aber nur einmal pro schwarzem Zauberspruch.

sideBoard.name: Throne of Bone
sideBoard.originalText: {1}: Any black spell cast gives you 1 life. Can only give 1 life each time a black spell is cast.
sideBoard.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
